title: Caesar Cipher Converter
description: A web application that enables users to encrypt and decrypt text quickly using the Caesar Cipher method.
features: Internationalization: enabling users to select their preferred language for text processing.
Theme Toggle: enabling users to switch between light and dark themes with a single button.
Accurate Decryption: providing users with accurate decryption by leveraging a dictionary-based algorithm.

title: Geospatial Country Information API
description: RESTful API that provides geospatial and demographic data about countries passed via query.
features: Users can query information such as population, area size, languages, timezone, currency, and the national flag by providing a country's name.

title: Binary-to-String Converter
description: A simplistic utility web tool to simplify the process of converting binary data to text and vice versa.
features: Tailored for those who work with binary data and need a quick, efficient way to encode or decode binary strings.
